com.davidbracewell.cache

Class CacheProxy<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.cache.CacheProxy<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type parameter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, InvocationHandler

    public class CacheProxy<T>
extends Object
implements InvocationHandler, Serializable
    Wraps an object automatically caching calls to methods with the Cached annotation.
    Author:
    David B. Bracewell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
